info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 6 at 9:30PM CDT until May 8 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Shreveport LA
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas...
East Fork Angelina River Near Cushing affecting Rusk and Nacogdoches Counties.
For the East Fork Angelina River...including Cushing...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...East Fork Angelina River near Cushing.
* WHEN...From Wednesday morning to Thursday evening.
* IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, Minor lowland flooding.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 15.0 feet. - Forecast...The East Fork Angelina River will rise to flood stage tomorrow morning. It will then fall to 10.3 feet early Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 15.0 feet on 12/15/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas.
For more hydrologic information, copy and paste the following website address into your favorite web browser URL bar: https://water.noaa.gov/wfo/SHV
The next statement will be issued Wednesday evening at 930 PM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING TO THURSDAY EVENING
